name: Groundbreaker
description:
WASD/Arrow keys - Move

Space - Jump

My submission to the GMTK Game Jam 2020

Play as a funky dude trying to make his way out of a constantly devolving world. Every jump makes the level increasingly out of control, and every leap to the goal makes the level both easier and more challenging to navigate.

Download the .zip file, unzip and play!

All assets/gameplay (except fonts) by me
